title: Lia File Feed
description:
The connector ingests indicators of compromise (IOCs) from the Loader Insight Agency (LIA) File Feed, establishing relationships between IOCs to provide context such as the loader family responsible for downloading a payload and theURL from which it was downloaded. If known, the payload is tagged with a detection, offering insights into which malware loader delivers specific malware.
NOTE: Requires a LIA File Feed subscription and can be acquired at https://loaderinsight.agency.
